# א.א. עבודות קידוחים ופיתוח — AA Drilling & Development

> Israeli contractor specializing in bentonite drilling, earthworks, infrastructure development, drainage pits, and heavy equipment rental with certified operators. Licensed contractor #36281 with 10+ years of experience. Serving all of Israel with headquarters in Elikhin (Sharon region).

## Business Identity

- **Company Name (Hebrew):** א.א. עבודות קידוחים ופיתוח
- **Company Name (English):** AA Drilling & Development
- **Contractor License:** 36281 (Registered Contractor, Israel)
- **Phone:** 052-9556123 (+972-52-9556123)
- **Email:** eliav1334@gmail.com
- **Website:** https://eliavafar.co.il
- **Location:** Elikhin (אליכין), Sharon region, Israel
- **Service Area:** All of Israel, specializing in central Israel (HaSharon, Netanya, Hod HaSharon, Herzliya, Kfar Saba, Ra'anana, Tel Aviv metropolitan area)
- **Working Hours:** Sunday–Thursday 07:00–19:00, Friday 07:00–13:00
- **Languages:** Hebrew

## Core Services

### 1. Bentonite & Polymer Drilling (קידוחי בנטונייט ופולימר)
Foundation piles (כלונסאות), retaining walls, drainage and infiltration pits, absorption wells. Uses mobile bentonite station for on-site slurry preparation. Drilling diameters from 60cm to 150cm, depths up to 30+ meters.
- [Service Page](https://eliavafar.co.il/bentonite-drilling)

### 2. Earthworks & Infrastructure (עבודות עפר ופיתוח תשתיות)
Excavation, land grading, road paving, sewer and water line installation, drainage solutions, construction waste removal, and site preparation for construction projects.
- [Service Page](https://eliavafar.co.il/earthworks)

### 3. Drainage & Infiltration Pits (בורות חלחול והחדרה)
Drilling drainage pits using bentonite/polymer method for private homes, villas, and commercial projects. Includes soil percolation testing, planning, permitting assistance, and execution.
- [Service Page](https://eliavafar.co.il/drainage-pits)

### 4. Heavy Equipment Rental — With Certified Operator (השכרת ציוד כבד עם מפעיל)
Bobcat, mini excavator, excavator, drilling machine, and mobile bentonite station. All equipment comes with a certified operator — no self-operated rental available. Insurance and safety-compliant equipment.
- [Service Page](https://eliavafar.co.il/equipment-rental)

## Important Distinctions
- Equipment rental is ALWAYS with a certified operator — no standalone equipment rental
- The company does NOT provide: CFA piles, micropiles (different machinery/field)
- Diaphragm walls are a product of bentonite drilling, not a separate service
